bio:
Optimism divulgator.
Helping people to understand the Optimism Layer-2 network, built to address Ethereum's scalability challenges.
contributionDescription:
Helping people and communities to understand how Optimism addresses Ethereum's scalability challenges and reason-why to choose Optimism compared to other L2.
Communities include universities in Rome (NABA academy, Roma Tre University), online Discord communities and friends.

contributionLinks.description: Onchain Data, Utilities, References, and other Analytics on Optimism

impactDescription:
Helping people and communities to understand how Optimism addresses Ethereum's scalability challenges and reason-why to choose Optimism compared to other L2.
Communities include universities in Rome (NABA academy, Roma Tre University), online Discord communities and friends.
Thanks to my approach I introduced dozens of new users into the Optimism Collective.
pwCategorySuggestions: Developer Education, Layer 2 Scaling, Community Building
